title: verify_wifi_connection_and_ntp_sync_on_startup
description: Test that the device successfully connects to WiFi in STA mode and synchronizes time via NTP server upon startup.

title: validate_ultrasonic_sensor_distance_reading
description: Verify that the ultrasonic sensor (HC-SR04) correctly measures the petrol tank level in centimeters and returns accurate distance values.

title: test_relay_control_on_gpio15_active_low_logic
description: Ensure the relay connected to GPIO15 correctly turns the heating system ON when set LOW and OFF when set HIGH, following active-low logic.

title: check_firebase_status_and_history_update
description: Verify that the system updates the Firebase Realtime Database with current system status, petrol tank level, timestamp, and appends entries to the history log.

title: validate_firebase_connection_test_at_startup
description: Test that the device performs a Firebase connection test at startup by writing and reading a test payload to confirm network and database availability.

title: test_firebase_command_polling_and_relay_response
description: Verify that the device polls Firebase command.json for ON/OFF commands and manual updates, correctly deduplicates commands, and controls the relay accordingly.

title: verify_periodic_firebase_updates_when_relay_on
description: Ensure that when the heating system relay is ON, the device sends periodic status updates to Firebase every 30 minutes as configured.

title: validate_timestamp_format_and_accuracy
description: Check that timestamps generated by the device are formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS' and correspond accurately to the actual event times.
